definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: But i heard you are the best.
sentences.chinese: 在某個領域裏最優秀，卻又不以此自矜。

sentences.english: A must for the amateur anthropologist who seeks to guage the feromonic field.
sentences.chinese: 爲業餘人類學家在測量領域尋求軌跡而準備的物品。

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知識產權已經成爲外交外貿領域的重要議題。

sentences.english: Conflow supplies high pressure underground equipment for coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 康福路爲煤礦領域提供井下耐高壓產品。

sentences.english: Polio eradication is one of our most important areas of unfinished business.
sentences.chinese: 根除脊髓灰質炎是我們未完成工作的最重要領域之一。

sentences.english: A novel infantile enemator belongs to the technical field of medical equipment.
sentences.chinese: 新型小兒灌腸器，屬於醫療用具技術領域。

sentences.english: Disclosed is a novel bone peg, belonging to medical appliance technical field.
sentences.chinese: 新型骨釘，屬於醫療用具技術領域。

sentences.english: Won the "Sama educate award" in the area of garments industry.
sentences.chinese: 獲紡織服裝領域“桑麻教育獎”。

sentences.english: Speech acts are the important field in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 言語行爲是語用學研究的一個重要領域。

sentences.english: Why would anyone care about them outside of this domain?
sentences.chinese: 在這個領域之外還有什麼人會在乎它呢？

sentences.english: We think it’s possible that your company is at risk in this area as well.
sentences.chinese: 因而我們認爲貴司在這個領域也可能面臨同樣的風險。

sentences.english: Pico-satellites are the import investigative domain in the modern aerospace technologies.
sentences.chinese: 皮型衛星是現代航天技術中的重要研究領域。

sentences.english: This new technology is sure to make waves in the cellular phone.
sentences.chinese: 最新的科技一定會在手機的領域中造成鬨動。

sentences.english: Sixth, citation studies are highly field-sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 第六，引用研究對領域具有高度敏感性。

sentences.english: Wolter products are used both in general building services applications as well as various industrial areas.
sentences.chinese: 華徳產品一般是用在建築服務和各種工業領域。

sentences.english: He's a pre-eminent authority in the field of bio-chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 他是生化學這個領域最傑出的權威人士。
